plurals.name: viewAllXRounds
plurals.comment:
viewAllXRounds [one] [other]
%s is the number of rounds in the Swiss tournament.

resources.string: Eit ulike antal rundar gjer optimal fargefordeling.

string.name: roundInterval
string.comment:
roundInterval
Specifically a time interval (e.g. 5 minutes) between rounds in a Swiss tournament

string.name: forbiddenPairings
string.comment:
forbiddenPairings
This option disallows pairing certain players.

resources.string: Brukernamn for spelarar som ikkje må spela saman (til dømes sysken). To brukarnamn per linje, skilde med eit mellomrom.

string.name: newSwiss
string.comment:
newSwiss
Appears on a button: clicking this lets you create a new tournament in the Swiss format.
